book.synopsis: The further misadventures of the Rabbitte family in working-class Dublin--from the author of The Commitments and The Snapper. This story follows Jimmy Rabbitte, Sr., and his best friend through Dublin, selling cheap grub to the drunk and hungry--keeping one step ahead of the health officials.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.75 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
